Music and Convention Centre (Auditorium Stravinski), Montreux, VD, Switzerland Special Prize: Principal cornet (Brass Band Cazis)
( Around 2016 National a Number of Bands and Representatives had very critical Feedback after many Years of inexplicable Fluctuations, the high and even rising Number of Entries, questionable Set Works and related Difficulties to assure a real and fair Contest ). 2017 saw no bigger Adjustments yet, but the Discussion like limiting the Entries will not disappear.
